class.name: CobbAPIBatchMoveGroup
class.blurb: Functions for moving a group of references, optionally with an offset relative to the target.

description.p: This API allows you to move a group of references. A single reference is designated the "root" of the group. You can control where the root ends up, and all other references will maintain their positions relative to the root. You must manually specify a root, or the operation will fail without making any changes. The root will always be moved first, even if you don't add it as a "child;" it will not be moved redundantly if you do add it as a child.

To use the API, you call a function to create a BatchMoveGroup task; this function returns a numeric "handle," which is like a ticket that you can exchange to access your task. Once you have a handle, you can use additional functions to configure your task, and then call a final function to run the task and receive results.
A task can only be configured or used by the same Papyrus call stack that created it; you can't pass a handle to some other part of your mod and operate on it later.

method.name: AddChild

args.arg: The numeric handle for a BatchMoveGroup task.

method.blurb: Adds a reference to the group.

method.name: AddChildren

args.arg: The numeric handle for a BatchMoveGroup task.

method.blurb: Adds multiple references to the group.

method.name: Cancel
method.blurb: Aborts a BatchMoveGroup task, allowing its handle to be reused.

args.arg: The numeric handle for a BatchMoveGroup task.

method.name: Create
method.blurb: Creates a BatchMoveGroup task, and returns its numeric handle.

example-data.comment: Setting the root manually is mandatory.

method.name: Run
method.blurb: Executes a BatchMoveGroup task and returns an array of the references that were successfully moved.

args.arg: The numeric handle for a BatchMoveGroup task.

method.name: SetAlsoMoveTeleportMarkers

args.arg: The numeric handle for a BatchMoveGroup task.

method.blurb: Controls how a BatchMoveGroup operation handles load doors' teleport markers.

description.p: Controls how a BatchMoveGroup task handles load doors' teleport markers. By default, the task does nothing to teleport markers (equivalent to passing False to this function); if you pass True to this function, then the task will maintain the offset between a moved load door and its destination's teleport marker.

method.blurb: Sets the target coordinates for the group root.

method.blurb: Sets the target position for the group root.

method.name: SetDestinationRotation

args.arg: The numeric handle for a BatchMoveGroup task.

method.blurb: Sets the target rotation for the group root.

args.arg: The numeric handle for a BatchMoveGroup task.

method.blurb: Sets the target cell that references will be moved to, if you wish to move references to a different cell.
